name: Almay Biodegradable Makeup Remover Pads, Micellar Gentle, Hypoallergenic, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist & Ophthalmologist Tested, 120 Count
short_description: GENTLE MICELLAR EYE MAKEUP REMOVAL: Ultra gentle micellar water cleansing pads easily remove all traces of eye makeup without pulling or tugging on your delicate eye area
OIL FREE AND EASY: While micellar molecules lift off eye makeup, the oil free solution leaves behind no greasy residue and requires no rinsing, making these pads perfect for cleansing on the go
FORMULATED WITHOUT: Parabens, phthalates, SLS, DMDM Hydantoin, formaldehydes, and Triclosan

SUITABLE FOR SENSITIVE EYES: As part of the Almay promise, this product is hypoallergenic and ophthalmologist tested as well as clean, cruelty free, and fragrance free; it is also suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers
product_description: Effortless makeup removal just got a lot easier on your eyes—and the environment! With Almay Biodegradable Oil Free Micellar Eye Makeup Remover Pads™, you can instantly and neatly wipe away eye makeup in one step without leaving behind any greasy residue. Made from 100% biodegradable fibers, each pad is designed to gently and effectively sweep away makeup without pulling or tugging on your delicate eye area. The secret to our efficacious oil-free cleansing lies in the micellar molecules that lift off makeup, dirt, and oil from your skin and onto the pad. Not only is your eye area left clean (no need to rinse or cleanse!), skin feels soft and soothed. What’s more, these petite rounds are suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers, so throw a pack in your bag for guilt-free cleansing on the go! Formulated without added parabens, phthalates, SLS, DMDM Hydantoin, formaldehydes, and Triclosan. As always, hypoallergenic. Ophthalmologist tested. Clean. Cruelty free. Fragrance free.

This soap-free product won't leave pore-clogging residue behind and will never strip skin of its natural protective oils and emollients to help it stay healthy and looking fresh. These pre-moistened skin face wipes are ideal to use at home, after exercising or during travel to remove dirt, makeup and impurities. They're non-irritating and gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin. These sensitive skin wipes are suitable for everyday use and can help keep the user feeling refreshed when needed. They're dermatologist developed and tested, as well as non-comedogenic and fragrance-free, offering peace of mind. Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleansing Cloths are available in a convenient package that can easily fit into a suitcase or purse for taking on the go.

name: Simple Cleansing Wipes Face Wipes for Removing Makeup Kind to Skin Removes Waterproof Mascara, White, Fragnance Free, 25 Count, Pack of 6
short_description: GENTLE ON SKIN, TOUGH ON MAKEUP: Simple Cleansing Wipes work on everything from mascara to primer and are free from artificial fragrance or color, harsh chemicals, alcohol, and parabens.
A BOOST OF VITAMIN B5, VITAMIN E AND TRIPLE-PURIFIED WATER: Power down your day with a healthy skin boost. Our makeup remover wipes won't leave a residue, so you can use them before bed or on the go!
KISS YOUR SKIN WITH EACH USE: Use Kind To Skin face cleansing wipes as your favorite eye makeup remover, followed by your face cleanser or your other favorite skin care products.
GOOD FOR YOUR SKIN: These hypoallergenic face wipes leave no greasy residue and help remove makeup.
GENTLE AND FREE: Our makeup remover wipes are free from fragrance, artificial color, harsh chemicals, drying alcohol, parabens, and phthalates.
product_description: The face cleaning wipes you know and love that are designed to treat your skin with kindness! Simple Kind to Skin Cleansing Wipes are known for being kind to skin and now they are kind to the planet, too. These improved cleansing facial wipes are made of softer-than-silk fibers, gentle cleansers, purified water, and skin-loving ingredients like vitamin B5 and vitamin E.These makeup remover wipes are as safe as they are effective — tough on waterproof mascara, but formulated without fragrance, artificial color, harsh chemicals, drying alcohol, parabens or phthalates. They are also cruelty-free. Our cleansing wipes have the same thickness, softness, strength and stretchiness of other Simple face wipes, but are made with softer-than-silk fibers.To use, simply wipe over eyelids, face, lips and neck, remembering to reseal the pack each time. Do not flush this wipe after using it — the environment will thank you! We are committed to a cleaner future. Our commitment to being cleaner is about holding ourselves to a higher standard and discovering new ways to create effective skincare products that do what they say while being kind to your skin and the planet. We believe in continuously working to be kinder to the planet. That's why Kind to Skin Cleansing Wipes are vegan and Simple is certified Cruelty-Free by PETA, meaning we don't test on animals, anywhere in the world.

product_description: Product Description Cleanse skin and remove makeup in one easy step with Neutrogena Makeup Remover Face Wipes. These ultra-soft micellar cleansing wipes are pre-moistened facial cleansing wipes that effectively dissolve traces of dirt, oil and makeup--even waterproof mascara-- for clean, fresh looking skin every day. Our waterproof makeup remover features an effective micellar-infused, triple emollient formula that leaves skin feeling refreshed, nourished, conditioned and refreshingly clean with no heavy residue. These facial wipes also remove sweat, sunscreen, and pollution from skin with no need to rinse after use. These daily facial cleansing wipes are formulated to be gentle on the delicate eye area. The micellar-infused makeup remover wipes are formulated without parabens, alcohol, sulfates, phthalates, soaps, or dyes and are ophthalmologist-, dermatologist-, and allergy-tested. Designed with the earth in mind, these wipes are made with 100% plant based cloth. From the Manufacturer Make-up Remover Cleansing Towelettes Refill effectively dissolve all traces of dirt, oil and make-up ;even waterproof mascara ;for clean, fresh skin in one easy step. These gentle, ultra soft cloths contain superior cleansing technology so effective it removes even waterproof mascara. With one step, it leaves skin thoroughly clean with no heavy residue, so there's no need to rinse. And it's gentle enough to use around the sensitive eye area, even for contact lens wearers. Make your skin make-up free the easy way.

product_description: Cleanse, hydrate and remove makeup from your skin using Burt's Bees Micellar Rose Water Facial Towelettes. Designed for all skin types, these 3-in-1 facial cleanser wipes gently remove makeup, cleanse and hydrate your face in one simple step. These facial cleansing wipes use micellar cleansing technology to help remove dirt, oil and other impurities while leaving skin feeling clean and balanced. Plus, there's no need to rinse after using these makeup remover wipes—100% of users agree these skin care wipes do not leave a greasy or oily residue (1). Certified Home Compostable, these 99% natural origin gentle face cleanser towelettes are formulated without parabens, phthalates, petrolatum or SLS. These facial wipes are made with ingredients from nature and Leaping Bunny Certified (never tested on animals). Simply wipe your face with the makeup remover cloths to remove dirt, oil and makeup. Pair the facial cleansing towelettes with other Burt’s Bees facial skin care products. (1) Based on a 4-week clinical usage study of 42 women
